data.name: Boom
data.detailed_description: Boom is a logic puzzle game with a relaxing atmosphere. Players can place props with different effects to make these props have an effect that detonates a single bomb and then produces a continuous explosion. Use this effect to clear the target in the level and constantly challenge yourself Logical thinking!
data.about_the_game: Boom is a logic puzzle game with a relaxing atmosphere. Players can place props with different effects to make these props have an effect that detonates a single bomb and then produces a continuous explosion. Use this effect to clear the target in the level and constantly challenge yourself Logical thinking!
data.short_description: Boom is a logic puzzle game with a relaxing atmosphere, which builds clear links,An exciting new twist on a classic game without the element of guesswork!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Traditional Chinese*, Danish*, Ukrainian*, Russian*, Bulgarian*, Hungarian*, Turkish*, Greek*, Norwegian*, Czech*, Japanese*, Polish*, Thai*, Swedish*, Simplified Chinese*, Romanian*, Finnish*, Dutch*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Spanish - Latin America*, Vietnamese*, Arabic*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
